summary: Story 007 acceptance criteria are met: reconnect/resync replay automation is now covered, UAT checklist is executed and fully checked, required observability/runbook/decision documentation is present, and automated validation passed across the full suite (14 files, 53 tests).

criteria.description: Automated test suites cover critical flows: workflow real-time updates, reconnect/resync, cost windows, analytics outliers, document fallback, and sync status.
criteria.evidence: Workflow WS contracts and replay-on-resync are asserted in `tests/server/workflow-websocket-gateway.test.ts:115` and `tests/server/workflow-websocket-gateway.test.ts:197`; cost window semantics and outliers are covered in `tests/server/cost-analytics-routes.test.ts:58`, `tests/server/cost-analytics-routes.test.ts:110`, and `tests/server/cost-analytics-routes.test.ts:169`; document fallback behavior is validated in `tests/server/document-routes.test.ts:107` and `tests/client/documents-page.test.tsx:166`; sync status and consistency warnings are covered in `tests/server/project-kanban-sync-routes.test.ts:133` and `tests/server/sqlite-persistence-and-projection.test.ts:123`. Full suite run passed on 2026-02-19: 14 files / 53 tests.

criteria.description: UAT checklist validates primary journeys and confirms dark/light parity on critical tasks.
criteria.evidence: Checklist is marked executed with date and ownership (`src/ops/uat-checklist.md:3`-`src/ops/uat-checklist.md:5`), primary journeys all checked (`src/ops/uat-checklist.md:8`-`src/ops/uat-checklist.md:16`), dark/light parity checks completed (`src/ops/uat-checklist.md:19`-`src/ops/uat-checklist.md:23`), and responsive checks completed (`src/ops/uat-checklist.md:26`-`src/ops/uat-checklist.md:28`).

criteria.description: Observability dashboards and alerts are configured for freshness, stale sessions, sync failures, and lock contention.
criteria.evidence: Observability spec includes required metrics and alert rules: freshness (`event_to_ui_latency_ms`) at `src/ops/observability-dashboard-and-alerts.md:4` and `src/ops/observability-dashboard-and-alerts.md:30`, stale session ratio at `src/ops/observability-dashboard-and-alerts.md:8` and `src/ops/observability-dashboard-and-alerts.md:34`, sync failures at `src/ops/observability-dashboard-and-alerts.md:7` and `src/ops/observability-dashboard-and-alerts.md:38`, and lock contention at `src/ops/observability-dashboard-and-alerts.md:10` and `src/ops/observability-dashboard-and-alerts.md:46`.

criteria.description: Documentation is published for setup, architecture, API/WS contracts, and operational runbook.
criteria.evidence: Runbook documents startup/setup (`src/ops/operations-runbook.md:3`), architecture boundaries (`src/ops/operations-runbook.md:16`), REST and WS contract reference (`src/ops/operations-runbook.md:24` and `src/ops/operations-runbook.md:33`), KPI glossary assumptions (`src/ops/operations-runbook.md:37`), backup/restore for SQLite (`src/ops/operations-runbook.md:42`), and incident triage (`src/ops/operations-runbook.md:52`).

criteria.description: MVP exit criteria mapping is documented with pass/fail evidence for each criterion.
criteria.evidence: Exit criteria matrix with per-criterion status/evidence is present in `src/ops/mvp-exit-criteria-evidence.md:5`-`src/ops/mvp-exit-criteria-evidence.md:18`; unresolved Phase 0 decisions are tracked in `src/ops/decision-register.md:5`-`src/ops/decision-register.md:13`.

issues_found.description: Client test runs emit React Router v7 future-flag warnings, adding non-actionable CI noise.
issues_found.recommendation: Enable the documented future flags in test/router setup or suppress known warnings in test harness to keep QA signal clean.

details.note: 14 test files and 53 tests passed in 3.45s on 2026-02-19.
5 tests passed, including reconnect resync replay assertion.
8 tests passed covering windows, outliers, lineage, and KPI metadata.
4 tests passed including unsupported/missing fallback behavior.
5 tests passed including sync warning contract checks.
3 tests passed including sync-status detail and lock retry metrics.

code_quality_notes: Reconnect/resync gap identified in prior QA is now closed by an explicit replay assertion in gateway-level WS tests.
Operational documentation is cohesive: observability thresholds, runbook triage, and decision tracking are aligned to MVP go/no-go needs.
Coverage spans both API contracts and client rendering/fallback behavior, reducing risk of cross-layer regressions.
